entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:25 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 06:44 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
